title: Add audit trail for AI-generated content lifecycle (create/edit/export/delete)

sections.text: Implement immutable audit logging for all AI-generated artifacts in Sales_Accelerator (emails, call notes, next-best-action recommendations) covering generate, view, edit, export, and delete events. Each event should record actor, timestamp, artifact ID/type, source context (account/opportunity), and before/after diffs for edits, and be queryable by Sales Ops/Admin for compliance reviews. Ensure logs are captured server-side for both UI and API actions and are retained independent of RBAC UI gating.
